recipe.title: Classic Spaghetti Bolognese
recipe.description: A traditional Italian pasta dish with a rich and savory meat sauce.

instructions.step: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a separate pan, heat olive oil and sauté onions and garlic until translucent.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Stir in tomato sauce and let simmer for 15 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve sauce over spaghetti and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.

recipe.title: Vegetarian Chili
recipe.description: A hearty and spicy vegetarian chili with a variety of beans and vegetables.

instructions.step: Heat olive oil in a large pot and sauté onions and garlic until softened.
Add bell peppers and cook for another 5 minutes.
Stir in chili powder and cumin, and cook for 1 minute.
Add beans and diced tomatoes. Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
